translation.en: [Mia] What would you do if, for the last seven months,
translation.es: ¿Qué harías si, durante los últimos siete meses,

translation.en: your life had been made of walls?
[Mia] Every morsel you eat had been monitored
translation.es: ¿Y si hubieran vigilado cada bocado que comías

translation.en: and every pound of weight you put on, charted.
translation.es: y registrado cada kilo que aumentabas?

translation.en: And now, all you have to do to get out
translation.es: ¿Y si ahora, para salir, lo único que tuvieras que hacer

translation.en: is not be crazy for the next five minutes.
translation.es: es no estar loca durante los próximos cinco minutos?

translation.en: [Mia] Could you do that?
Tick-tock.
Tick. Tock.
[faintly] Mia?
Dr. Nell asked if you were listening. I am.
translation.es: - El Dr. Nell preguntó si estabas atenta. - Sí.

translation.en: I have been, yeah.
Wonderful. Uh, well, we've been through your discharge papers.
translation.es: Grandioso. Bueno, hemos revisado los papeles para el alta.

translation.en: That's sorted.
And Dr. Olsen has briefed you on your medication?
translation.es: ¿Y la doctora Olsen te ha indicado la medicación?

translation.en: -She did. Yes. Very thorough. -[Dr. Nell] That's what we like.
translation.es: - Sí, fue muy detallista. - Es nuestro estilo.

translation.en: I've sent the prescriptions through to the pharmacy, so Dad, if you want to pick it up,
translation.es: Envié las recetas a la farmacia, así que, papá, puedes retirar todo,

translation.en: and Mia, why don't you head up to the dormitory and gather your things?
translation.es: y, Mia, ¿por qué no vas al dormitorio y recoges tus cosas?

translation.en: Meems, you good?
Yeah. Almost done.
[Dr. Nell] Now, in terms of your daily schedule and routine, we've spoken to your school
translation.es: En cuanto a tus horarios y a tu rutina, hablamos con tu escuela,

translation.en: and teachers and lunch staff will be on hand to help during the day.
translation.es: y los profesores y el personal del comedor estarán disponibles para ayudarte.

translation.en: And, at home, as far as the meal plan goes, same routine as here.
translation.es: En tu casa, seguirás la rutina y el plan de alimentación que tenías aquí.

translation.en: And, Mia, a big part of this has to come from you.
translation.es: Y, Mia, en gran parte, esto depende de ti,

translation.en: Knowing your own body, respecting the recovery plan.
translation.es: de conocer tu cuerpo y de respetar el plan de recuperación.

translation.en: We're still in an adjustment period.
[Mia] Get ready to lie…
So you will take it easy to begin with?
translation.es: Así que debes empezar de a poco.

translation.en: [Mia] Now.
Yeah.
Nice.
Good. Then you can shoot off.
[Mia sighs] Home.
♪ I spend a long time ♪ ♪ Thinking about the things I should change ♪
[Mia] They say you never remember the smell of home until you've spent some time away.
translation.es: Dicen que para reconocer el olor a hogar debes pasar un tiempo lejos.

translation.en: Well, turns out home is bigger than I thought.
translation.es: Bueno, mi hogar es más extenso de lo que pensé.

translation.en: This car is home.
London is home.
Home is here.
Home is my dad.
How are you feeling?
Fine.
Back there you had a team of specialists to cater to everything.
translation.es: Ahí los especialistas se encargaban de todo.

translation.en: -Out here you've just got little old me. -And little old Prozac.
translation.es: - Ahora tienes a este viejo. - Y al viejo Prozac.

translation.en: There is always little old Prozac.
And teachers, and friends.
And Mum.
She did really want to be there today.
translation.es: Hoy tenía muchas ganas de venir.

translation.en: How's Alex?
Fine. Yeah, fine.
He's really looking forward to having you home.
translation.es: Está ansioso de que vuelvas a casa.

translation.en: Yeah. Well, for now I just want to lie down in my own bed and be by my lonesome.
translation.es: Bueno, por ahora, lo único que quiero es recostarme en mi cama y estar sola.

translation.en: Yeah.
Yep, yep, yep. You would want that, wouldn't you?
translation.es: Sí, es lógico que quieras eso, ¿no?

translation.en: -Just a few family… -Dad. …and neighbors, and Mrs. McGinty.
translation.es: Estará la familia, unos vecinos y la señora McGinty.

translation.en: Dad!
Oh, I thought that you might want to see everyone.
translation.es: Es que pensé que querrías ver a todo el mundo.

translation.en: -Oh, Jesus fuck, Rick! -We've all really missed you.
translation.es: - ¡Por Dios, Rick! - Todos te extrañamos mucho.

translation.en: So, I'm being thrown a party for having flown the cuckoo's nest?
translation.es: ¿Me harán una fiesta por salir del loquero?

translation.en: -It's fine, fine, fine. -What're you doing?
-I am calling them, telling them to leave. -Wait. No. Fuck. Don't do that.
translation.es: - Llamaré para decirles que se vayan. - Espera. No llames.

translation.en: -But you just said-- -It's fine.
-You sure? -Mm-hmm.
[Rick groaning] I'm an idiot!
[Rick] Please try and act surprised.
[all] Surprise!
Surprise!
Oh my God, you guys, you shouldn't have!
[Mia] Fucking nailed that.
-Aw… -[Mia] Gran.
We couldn't resist, cherub.
-It's lovely to see you too. -Oh, you look so wonderful.
So healthy.
[Mia] Ugh. That word.
Thanks.
Heya.
[Mia] Jesus, hi.
I tried to talk them out of it, believe me.
[woman] Where's my girl?
Oh my God.
Hey, Mum.
Awkward hug incoming.
Darling, sweetheart. I'm so sorry I'm late.
translation.es: Cariño, mi amor, perdón por llegar tarde.

translation.en: The airport was absolutely horrendous…
[Mia] Or no hug. Yep, that's definitely worse.
translation.es: O ningún abrazo. Sí, eso es peor.

translation.en: Was everything alright with Dr. Nell?
[clicks tongue] All fine. Better than fine.
Oh, you are a star.
I'm so sorry I couldn't be more help.
translation.es: Lamento no haber podido ayudar más.

translation.en: [Mia] More?
You're here now.
[Gran] Mia?
A slice for the girl of the hour.
translation.es: Una porción para la chica del momento.

translation.en: [Mia] You've got to be fucking kidding me.
translation.es: La puta madre. No lo puedo creer.

translation.en: [Gran] I made coconut sponge. Your favorite.
translation.es: Hice un pastel de coco. Tu favorito.

translation.en: -I'll just be a minute. -Sweetheart, you--
Overall, could have gone better.
[Mia] Okay, Mia, name five things you can see.
translation.es: Bien, Mia, menciona cinco cosas que puedas ver.

translation.en: Loo roll.
Toilet brush.
Hand cream.
Soap.
Mirror.
Get your shit together, Mia. It's just cake.
translation.es: Contrólate, Mia. Es solo un pastel.

translation.en: You can't go back there.
[Rick] She's not having bloody cake.
[Gran] But she looks so healthy.
[Rick] She has an issue with food.
translation.es: Tiene un problema con la comida.

translation.en: [softly] Healthy.
[Gran] They wouldn't have let her out if she wasn't better.
translation.es: No habría recibido el alta si no estuviera mejor.

translation.en: -You don't know… -She is okay.
translation.es: - Tú no sabes… - Ya está bien.

translation.en: Um… It does look delicious,
translation.es: - Tú no sabes… - Ya está bien. Se ve delicioso, pero quizá lo pruebe en otro momento.

translation.en: but I think I might take a rain check. Uh…
translation.es: Se ve delicioso, pero quizá lo pruebe en otro momento.

translation.en: The medication. I just feel a bit off.
translation.es: Me siento un poco rara por la medicación.

translation.en: Of course, darling.
Thank you, Gran.
Why not go and have a lie down?
Relax for a bit.
-[Mia's mum] Yeah. -[Gran] Yeah.
[Mia] If you drop a glass and it breaks, you can always glue it back together.
translation.es: Si se te cae un vaso y se rompe, puedes arreglarlo con pegamento.

translation.en: But if you drop it again and again and again,
translation.es: Pero si se te cae una y otra vez,

translation.en: eventually, it's going to be more glue than glass.
translation.es: con el tiempo, será más pegamento que vaso.

translation.en: I wonder which I am now?
I used to write these lists every day.
Everything I ate down to the mouthful.
I thought they were helping me, drowning out the bad thoughts.
translation.es: Pensaba que eso me ayudaba a eliminar los malos pensamientos.

translation.en: I didn't realize they were drowning out the good as well.
translation.es: No noté que también eliminaba los buenos.

translation.en: All the everyday beauty I forgot how to see.
translation.es: Olvidé cómo apreciar la belleza de lo cotidiano.

translation.en: And all the things I get to rediscover now.
translation.es: Y todo lo que ahora podré redescubrir.

translation.en: There she is. How are you feeling, princess?
Good. Excited.
That's the spirit.
Morning, all.
[Rick] Good morning.
There's some breakfast for you here.
Oh, got to dash. Meeting a new client. I'm trying to convince them lavender is the new teal.
translation.es: Tengo prisa. Un cliente nuevo no acepta que el lavanda es tendencia.

translation.en: Smoothie, anyone? [Rick] Remember what Dr. Nell said? Family meals?
translation.es: - ¿Quieren un batido? - El Dr. Nell sugirió comer en familia.

translation.en: Yes, but I haven't got time today.
translation.es: Sí, pero hoy no tengo tiempo.

translation.en: Well, can you make time?
[Mia] Glad to see nothing's changed here.
translation.es: Me alegra ver que todo sigue igual.

translation.en: [Viv] Sorry, did you say something?
translation.es: - ¿Dijiste algo? - Sería bueno que comieras aquí.

translation.en: [Rick] Might be nice for you to eat with us.
translation.es: - ¿Dijiste algo? - Sería bueno que comieras aquí. Si no trabajara, no habría comida en la mesa.

translation.en: [Viv] Food doesn't get on the table if I don't work, I'm afraid.
translation.es: Si no trabajara, no habría comida en la mesa.

translation.en: Now, before you go…
translation.es: Bueno, antes de que te vayas…

translation.en: [Mia] Oh great, "a little chat."
We thought it might be best to have a little chat with you.
translation.es: Nos parece que deberíamos tener una charla.

translation.en: Darling, chat? Yeah, yes. Um…
Mia. You know how much today is worth?
translation.es: Mia, el día de hoy es muy importante.

translation.en: Flying solo for the first time in six months…
translation.es: Salir por tu cuenta por primera vez en seis meses…

translation.en: Seven months.
We're giving you this chance to show us that you're ready.
translation.es: Te damos esta oportunidad para mostrarnos que estás lista.

translation.en: We just want you to stay here and be happy with us.
translation.es: Te queremos cerca y queremos que seas feliz aquí.

translation.en: And we want you to be honest this time.
translation.es: Y, también, que esta vez seas sincera.

translation.en: I know.
So, just for emergencies…
Oh, where's my phone?
Yeah, the advice says no social media.
translation.es: Bueno, aconsejaron que no usaras redes sociales.

translation.en: Might as well have given me a cup and string.
translation.es: Es como darme un vaso y una cuerda.

translation.en: Right, now that's over with, to the office with me.
translation.es: Bien, ya tuvimos la charla. Ahora iré a la oficina.

translation.en: Cinnamon.
Thanks for holding the fort.
Bloody mental baskets, aren't they?
You're a bit Disney this morning.
Oh, look at me, just walking in the sun.
translation.es: Mírame, estoy caminando bajo el sol.

translation.en: No one to tell me where to go, what to do.
translation.es: Nadie me dice adónde ir ni qué hacer.

translation.en: This is living, my brother.
This is…
[Mia] Oh shit.
I'll be nearby, okay?
My first friend.
Best friend.
Or so I thought.
-Hey, skinny. -[Mia scoffs]
What?
No. I read somewhere that you're supposed to acknowledge it. No repression and that.
translation.es: Leí por ahí que es mejor reconocerlo y no reprimirlo ni nada de eso.

translation.en: You're looking taller.
Yeah, well, it's been a while.
translation.es: Sí, es que pasó mucho tiempo.

translation.en: No kidding.
I missed you, M.
Right.
-I'm sorry. -Since when did you start smoking?
Is that a veiled hint?
I like my lungs, they've always been on my side.
translation.es: Me gustan mis pulmones, nunca me traicionaron.

translation.en: Look, M, can we…
Can we talk about it?
About what happened.
[girl] Oh, would you look at this vision!
[Mia] Becca, quite possibly a Mensan.
translation.es: Becca, quien podría ser una superdotada.

translation.en: And Will, my wife.
Doth mine eyes deceive me!
Called in the cavalry.
Any longer and I might have just weed myself.
translation.es: Casi me hago pis de la ansiedad.

translation.en: -You literally visited me three days ago. -Oh, three miserable days.
translation.es: - Me visitaste hace tres días. - Fueron tres días deprimentes.

translation.en: [Mia] These are the greatest people of all time.
translation.es: Son las mejores personas de la historia.

translation.en: -Too long. -Way too long.
Never again?
No promises. Never promises.
translation.es: No hagas promesas. Nunca prometas nada.

translation.en: Never again.
I'm all yours now.
Let's go fuck up some shit. [laughs]
Mia, are you okay?
Yeah, yeah, I'm fine.
Uh, excuse me!
Hey, there you are. I thought you'd gone overboard.
translation.es: Ahí estás. Pensé que te habías arrepentido.

translation.en: -You're good, yeah? -Oh, fuck good.
She's better than good, she's free.
So much to see, so much to do. I mean, where do we even start?
translation.es: Hay mucho para ver y hacer. ¿Por dónde empezamos?

translation.en: I was thinking maybe the cinema? Or the skate park?
translation.es: Había pensado en ir al cine o al parque de patinaje.

translation.en: Oh… [laughs] We haven't gone there in forever.
Uh, the cinema though, we can go this Friday?
translation.es: Al cine podríamos ir el viernes.

translation.en: -Becs, this Friday we're supposed to be-- -[Will] Oh shit.
translation.es: - Becs, este viernes se supone que… - Mierda.

translation.en: Is that…
Oh God, hide me.
-I told her that I moved to Cameroon. -Why? Who is she?
translation.es: - Le dije que me mudé a Camerún. - ¿Por qué? ¿Quién es?

translation.en: The one that wanted to role-play as Mary, Queen of Scots or the one who wanted to stick a finger up--
translation.es: ¿Es la del juego de roles o la que quería meterte un dedo…?

translation.en: Yes. Her.
So you had… sex with her?
Who hasn't he had sex with? That's the real question.
translation.es: Sería más fácil preguntar con quién no.

translation.en: You can talk. At least I'm not going at it with my boss.
translation.es: Al menos yo no me revuelco con mi jefe.

translation.en: Seriously, you guys!
What? You said no salacious gossip till she was back. She's back!
translation.es: ¿Qué? Prohibiste los chismes jugosos hasta que ella regresara. ¡Y regresó!

translation.en: Only just. She's still in recovery.
Ah! She is recovered. Look at her.
translation.es: Ya está recuperada. Tan solo mírala.

translation.en: And the only thing she's starved of right now is gossip.
translation.es: Lo único que necesita son chismes.

translation.en: And I will be your waiter this evening.
translation.es: Y yo me encargaré de eso.

translation.en: And excuse me, me and my boss are not just "at it."
translation.es: Y lo de mi jefe no fue un simple revolcón.

translation.en: It was magical. In the store cupboard at work.
translation.es: Fue mágico. En el depósito de queso.

translation.en: He kept giving me eyes over the cheese counter. I still get a tingle when I think about Manchego.
translation.es: Me coqueteaba por encima del mostrador. Aún siento cosquillas si pienso en queso.

translation.en: Well, I'm glad I still have one respectable friend.
translation.es: Bueno, me alegra seguir teniendo una amiga respetable.

translation.en: Here's to our interminable virginity.
Ha-ha! She's a woman now!
What? No! You too?
-With who? -Just this guy at Reading.
translation.es: - ¿Con quién? - Con uno en el Festival de Reading.

translation.en: Why didn't you tell me?
Wasn't worth mentioning. It was no big deal.
translation.es: Es que no fue gran cosa.

translation.en: No big deal?
I'm pretty sure you compared it to… [panting] …a religious experience.
translation.es: Si hasta lo comparaste con una experiencia religiosa.

translation.en: Oh, speaking of drunken mistakes,
did you hear what Steph got up to at Nick's after we left?
translation.es: ¿supieron lo de Steph en la fiesta de Nick?

translation.en: -[Cameron] No. -[Becca] No.
[Mia] Fuck, how can I have missed so much in seven months?
translation.es: Mierda. ¿Cómo me perdí tantas cosas en siete meses?

translation.en: -Hey. Bro. -All right?
-Yo. Lads! -What's up?
It's like bloody Sesame Street in here.
Right?
Steph! Leanne! Sarah, you gorgeous thing!
You'll get used to it.
Yo, Becs, what you sayin'?
You're mates with Jonah? But we hate Jonah.
translation.es: ¿Eres amiga de Jonah? Pero odiamos a Jonah.

translation.en: He has the good weed.
There are multiple weeds?
I am sorry…
that I didn't tell you about Reading. I thought with everything--
translation.es: Debí contarte sobre el festival. Pensé que con todo…

translation.en: It's fine.
I get it. You were protecting me.
The concept of virginity is some bullshit invention of the patriarchy anyway.
translation.es: Además, la virginidad es un invento del patriarcado.

translation.en: Yeah.
Come on. We're this way.
translation.es: Ven. La clase es por aquí.

translation.en: Oi. Out my chair.
Oh, of course, sorry.
Uh, move along, dickhead.
Hello!
Hello!
Welcome, everyone, on this very special morning.
translation.es: Les doy la bienvenida esta mañana tan especial.

translation.en: [Mia] Christ. Not you too, Miss Lambert.
As discussed in the last registration,
the lovely Mia Polanco is rejoining us.
translation.es: hoy se reincorpora la adorable Mia Polanco.

translation.en: So everyone, please be extra, especially welcoming.
translation.es: Así que, por favor, sean amables y háganla sentir muy bienvenida.

translation.en: -Just like we talked about. -[Mia] Perfect.
That's perfect.
In AA, one of the first things they tell you
translation.es: En AA, uno de los primeros consejos

translation.en: is to avoid people, places, and things that trigger you.
translation.es: es que evites personas, lugares y cosas que reconozcas como disparadores.

translation.en: This doesn't exactly help when your trigger is something you literally need in order to literally live.
translation.es: Eso no es muy útil cuando tu disparador es algo que necesitas para vivir.

translation.en: And it isn't just eating that's the problem. It's after.
translation.es: Y el problema no es solo comer, sino lo que sigue después:

translation.en: It's the aching, inside-out panic of feeling the food settle.
translation.es: el pánico intenso y doloroso a sentir que la comida se asienta,

translation.en: Every day.
Trying always to find a better reason than "because they tell me to."
translation.es: Y el buscar un mejor motivo que "porque me dicen que debo hacerlo".

translation.en: Hi.
My name is Mia Polanco.
One moment.
There you go.
[Mia] Of course they saddle me with the Dwayne Johnson of potatoes.
translation.es: Y sí, por supuesto: me dan el Dwayne Johnson de las papas.

translation.en: Nope, it's fine.
Just a simple enormous potato.
[Becca] So what are we going to serve?
-Tequila? -[Will] Going to be absolutely rattled.
-Absolutely. -[Will shushing]
Hey.
What are you guys talking about?
[Will] I was just saying that Yorkie is the ultimate gay chocolate bar.
translation.es: Estaba diciendo que los Yorkie son el mejor chocolate gay.

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Bollocks. What about Twix or Mounds Bar?
translation.es: ¿Y qué hay de los Twix o los Mounds?

translation.en: Twix is pan, Mounds Bars are lesbian. Keep up.
translation.es: Twix es pansexual, Mounds es lesbiana.

translation.en: And what are Skittles?
-Ooh, Skittles. -Orgy.
Mia. I didn't know you'd be back today.
translation.es: Mia, no sabía que volverías hoy.

translation.en: [Mia] Alison. Entirely her own adjective.
Yeah, I figured it was time to--
translation.es: Sí, pensé que ya era hora de…

translation.en: Great. Great.
Hey, guys.
-Hi, Cameron. -Hi.
So, wow. [scoffs] It's been forever.
When's the last time I saw you? Like, Year 10?
translation.es: No nos vemos desde hace años, casi.

translation.en: I was here last year. It's been like seven months.
translation.es: Estuve aquí el año pasado. Pasaron unos siete meses.

translation.en: Yeah. Ages.
So, how are you? How was it?
It was… It was fine. You know how it is.
translation.es: Sí… nada mal. Ya sabes cómo es.

translation.en: Well, no. I don't. I've never been to a mental hospital.
translation.es: No, de hecho, no lo sé. Nunca estuve en un psiquiátrico.

translation.en: So, uh, A-levels are kicking my arse. -Alison, how are you finding them? -[Alison sighs]
translation.es: Me está yendo pésimo en los exámenes. Alison, ¿a ti cómo te va?

translation.en: I totally bombed the first assessment in Bio
translation.es: Me fue muy mal en Biología

translation.en: and I've never heard of any of the set texts for English.
translation.es: y no conocía ni un libro de Literatura.

translation.en: -One of them is Hamlet. -I know, right? It's crazy.
translation.es: - Uno es Hamlet. - Sí. Qué locura, ¿no?

translation.en: So, was your room all padded and stuff?
translation.es: Dime, ¿dormías en una habitación acolchada y eso?

translation.en: -Uh, no, that's not really-- -Don't get me wrong.
translation.es: - No, no era… - No me malinterpretes.

translation.en: I totally get where you're coming from.
translation.es: Sé por lo que has pasado.

translation.en: One summer, I literally lived off of nothing but Polo Mints.
-Oh, I'm so sorry, that sounds-- -No, don't be.
translation.es: - Lo siento mucho, es… - No, descuida.

translation.en: I looked great. I wore crop tops for like two months.
translation.es: Me veía genial. Mostré el abdomen durante dos meses.

translation.en: Are you going to Theo's party on Friday?
translation.es: ¿Irán a la fiesta de Theo el viernes?

translation.en: -Why are you all being weird? -He probably didn't know to invite you.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué actúan raro? - Seguro no sabía que habías regresado.

translation.en: -It probably won't be that good anyway. -Oh.
translation.es: No creo que sea gran cosa.

translation.en: At his last party, Will was literally like,
translation.es: En su última fiesta, Will dijo:

translation.en: "I've peaked. Kill me now. Life will not get better than this."
translation.es: "Ya pueden matarme. Nada superará este momento".

translation.en: [Mia] I thought I needed to get back to the person I was before,
translation.es: Pensé que necesitaba volver a ser la persona que era antes

translation.en: to the things I loved, but they all kept moving while I stood still.
translation.es: y a estar con mis seres queridos, pero todos siguieron adelante sin mí.

translation.en: Parties, drinking, drugs, sex. That's the new normal.
translation.es: Fiestas, alcohol, drogas, sexo. Esa es la nueva normalidad.

translation.en: That's what I need to catch up on, or else I'll be left behind.
translation.es: Debo ponerme al día con todo eso o me quedaré atrás.

translation.en: I'm way more in the mood for the cinema anyway.
translation.es: Igual, yo prefiero ir al cine.

translation.en: -Oh yeah. -Mm. Me too.
Or we could stay in, do Clueless again.
translation.es: O podríamos ver Ni idea en casa.

translation.en: Like, if… if you guys want. I don't really care.
translation.es: Si ustedes quieren. A mí me da igual.

translation.en: [Mia] A party is the perfect place to catch up.
translation.es: Una fiesta es ideal para ponerse al día.

translation.en: All the birds, one stone.
translation.es: Todos los pájaros de un tiro.

translation.en: Where are you going?
The other side.
This is a good idea. This is a good idea.
-This is a good-- -Theo! Oh God. I'm so sorry.
translation.es: - Es una buena… - ¡Theo! Cielos. Lo siento mucho.

translation.en: -[Theo] That's okay. -[Mia] Sorry.
-No, that's okay. It's, um… -Hi.
[Mia] Theo. The cutest of the cute.
translation.es: Theo: el más lindo de los lindos.

translation.en: Mia! You're back. Oh, that's bloody ace.
Can I come on Friday?
What?
To the party.
Is it, like, cool if I come?
Oh right.
Yeah, sure. If… you want to.
translation.es: Sí, por supuesto. Si eso quieres.

translation.en: Really?
I mean, great, perfect. Um…
Is there like an invitation I need to get in, or…
translation.es: ¿Para entrar debo mostrar una invitación o…?

translation.en: Uh, no, that's not really a thing.
translation.es: No, eso ya no se usa.

translation.en: Right. Of course.
So does that mean there won't be any party bags?
Damn, I knew there was something I forgot.
translation.es: Mierda, sabía que había olvidado algo.

translation.en: Yeah, 'cause the ones at your fifth birthday were, like, next-level.
translation.es: Sí, las de tu cumple de cinco fueron increíbles.

translation.en: -Is that why you want the invite? -Only reason. For the Chupa Chups.
translation.es: - ¿Por eso quieres ir? - Obvio, por los dulces.

translation.en: Guess I got some serious shopping to do.
translation.es: Supongo que tendré que ir de compras.

translation.en: I'll see you Friday, then.
Yeah, you will.
What the hell was that?
Just told Theo that I'd stop by the party if he was cool with it.
translation.es: Le dije a Theo que iría a su fiesta si me invitaba.

translation.en: And he was.
Okay, I'm loving this energy.
Are you sure this is a good idea? You just came out of the hospital.
translation.es: ¿Y te parece buena idea? Acabas de salir del hospital.

translation.en: Becs, I love you, but you really need to stop fussing.
translation.es: Becs, te adoro, pero debes dejar de preocuparte.

translation.en: I'm fine.
Look, I wouldn't be here if I wasn't.
translation.es: No estaría aquí si no estuviera bien.

translation.en: I'm going to a party with my favorite people, and I'm gonna have some fucking fun for once.
translation.es: Iré a una fiesta con mi gente favorita y al fin me divertiré.

translation.en: -Who are you and where did you put Mia? -[laughing]
translation.es: ¿Quién eres y qué hiciste con Mia?

translation.en: ♪ You go bow for the result o Nothing to discuss o ♪
translation.es: LISTA DE PENDIENTES SALIR DE FIESTA, BESAR, EMBORRACHARME, DROGAS, SEXO, PRIMERA CITA, UNA RELACIÓN…

translation.en: ♪ Cause I dey win by default… ♪
translation.es: SALIR DE FIESTA, BESAR, EMBORRACHARME, DROGAS, SEXO, PRIMERA CITA, UNA RELACIÓN…

translation.en: [Viv] Mia! Becca is here!
Say what you want about Viv, that woman smells damn good!
translation.es: Di lo que quieras de Viv, pero esa mujer huele delicioso.

translation.en: Oh! I could have stayed in that hug until uni.
Becs!
A fucking party. An actual fucking party.
translation.es: Una puta fiesta. Una fiesta de verdad.

translation.en: We are going to do all the things!
-Alcohol's a given, right? -It is.
And they probably hand out drugs like Party Rings?
translation.es: Y seguro repartirán drogas como copetín.

translation.en: Weird comparison, but yes.
But…
sex…
Big leap. Oh, come on. That's what parties are really about.
translation.es: - Qué gran salto. - Por favor. Para eso son las fiestas.

translation.en: That's the thing I'm missing. The thing to take me to normal.
translation.es: Me falta hacer todo eso para volver a ser normal.

translation.en: Normal ain't all it's cracked up to be.
Loads of slobbery boys called Henry.
That's where it gets murky for me. All the others you just jump in, but…
translation.es: Es que es difícil. Para todos fue de lo más normal,

translation.en: me, I'm missing that… key.
translation.es: pero yo no lo viví como el resto.

translation.en: That first step.
-Becs. -Mm-hmm?
How do you kiss?
[giggling] What?
Why?
More importantly, who?
Oh, does it matter? I just… I never really learned how
translation.es: No importa, pero nunca aprendí a besar,

translation.en: and you clearly know a hell of a lot more than I do now.
translation.es: y tú, claramente, ahora sabes mucho más que yo.

translation.en: Please! One guy, one tent. I'm hardly top shagger.
translation.es: ¡Por favor! Fue solo una vez. No tengo tanta experiencia.

translation.en: Oh, but Scotty T. You've been there.
translation.es: Pero tienes más que yo. Ya lo hiciste.

translation.en: You've seen the other side of the virgin coin. Come on. Tell me your ways.
translation.es: Cruzaste al otro lado de la virginidad. Por favor, enséñame.

translation.en: Why do you need to know?
Because if I tried to kiss someone now, it'd be like when I was a kid,
translation.es: Porque si besara a alguien, lo haría como cuando era pequeña

translation.en: just smashing Barbie and Ken's faces together.
translation.es: y chocaba las caras de Barbie y Ken.

translation.en: I mean, I don't know what to do with my hands.
translation.es: No sé qué hacer con las manos.

translation.en: -Or when to close my eyes. -Calm down. It's not that complicated.
translation.es: - O cuándo cerrar los ojos. - No es complicado.

translation.en: Or the tongue. I mean, what does that do?
translation.es: O qué hacer con la lengua.

translation.en: Is it round and round like the spin cycle? Or do you sort of just…
translation.es: ¿Doy vueltas y vueltas como una lavadora o es más…?

translation.en: Ugh. What lizard are you kissing?
Don't mock me. I'm pissing stress hormones.
translation.es: ¡No te burles de mí! Estoy desbordada de estrés.

translation.en: Okay, come here. Kiss me, then.
translation.es: Bueno, ven aquí. Bésame a mí.

translation.en: See, now, imagine there's a third nose between your noses.
translation.es: Ahora imagina que hay otra nariz entre nuestras narices.

translation.en: What?
That's when you close your eyes. When you're nose-width apart.
translation.es: Ahí cierras los ojos. Cuando estás a una nariz de distancia.

translation.en: -Nose-width? -Mm-hmm.
Good. Now, bringing in the tongue.
A very good tip, if you're ever unsure what you're doing,
translation.es: Un buen consejo si no sabes qué hacer:

translation.en: pay attention to how the other person's kissing you and kiss them back the same way. Got it?
translation.es: siente cómo te besa la otra persona y bésala haciendo lo mismo. ¿Entiendes?

translation.en: Mm. Okay, but how-- Oh.
Good. That wasn't bad.
Pretty good for your first go.
Now, that jumper? Mm-mm, it's just wrong. A very large man wore it golfing.
translation.es: Ahora, cámbiate, ese sweater es feo. Parece de un golfista grandote.

translation.en: What, that's all your advice? "Pretty good" is far from perfect.
translation.es: ¿Ya está, fin de los consejos? Debe salirme perfecto.

translation.en: Perfection takes 1,000 hours and, ooh, the party starts in two.
translation.es: La perfección lleva mil horas y la fiesta empieza en dos.

translation.en: Now, makeup, do you want to go loud or sexy?
translation.es: Hablemos del maquillaje. ¿Quieres algo llamativo o sexi?

translation.en: Yes.
Heading out now. Bye, guys!
-Thank you for having me, Mr. and Mrs. P. -Hold up.
translation.es: - Gracias por todo señor y señora P. - Esperen.

translation.en: You've had your evening snack?
I had it earlier.
Oh gosh, don't you both look lovely.
Bit dressed up for the cinema, eh?
Oh, don't be silly.
Finally rubbing off on you. Up to the nines wherever you go.
translation.es: Parece que al fin me haces caso. Debes ir elegante, vayas adonde vayas.

translation.en: -Right, you taught me well. -[Viv] Have fun, darling.
translation.es: - Sí, me enseñaste bien. - Diviértete, cariño.

translation.en: -Did she look a little-- -She's fine.
translation.es: - ¿No se veía un poco…? - Está bien.

translation.en: -Maybe I should-- -She's fine.
You're weird. What?
It's nice seeing you like this. You look like Mia.
translation.es: Me alegra verte así. Luces como Mia.

translation.en: -Oh, about time! -Hey. Right, you ready?
-[Mia] So ready. -Mm-hmm?
[Becca] Here we go.
Now this, my friend, is a party.
translation.es: Esto, amiga mía, es una fiesta.

translation.en: That is nasty.
[Mia] Holy fuck.
-This is everything. -[Will] Mia, come on.
So yeah, work was fucking weird.
translation.es: Sí, hoy en el trabajo estuvo todo muy raro.

translation.en: Or at least smelled fucking weird. Something about pancetta going off.
translation.es: O, al menos, olía muy raro. Pasaba algo con una panceta podrida.

translation.en: Is pancetta bacon or cheese?
[Will] I should really know that.
Thank you.
Thanks.
[Mia] How is it so easy for them?
How can they just eat and drink?
translation.es: ¿Cómo pueden comer y beber como si nada?

translation.en: How am I 16 and can't just do that?
translation.es: ¿Por qué tengo 16 y no puedo hacerlo?

translation.en: Want one?
[Mia] Mayday. Meal plan. Don't drink.
translation.es: Alerta. Plan de alimentación. No bebas.

translation.en: Oh, what are you guys doing here?
We were literally talking about this with you the other day.
translation.es: Hablamos de esto contigo el otro día.

translation.en: Are you drinking on your medication? I'd imagine you're on like a fuck-ton.
translation.es: ¿Puedes beber alcohol? Debes estar tomando mucha medicación.

translation.en: Um, yeah. Kind of.
That is so fun. Get proper wavy gravy.
[Mia] A shot's okay. At least I can track what's in that.
translation.es: Puedo beber un trago. Al menos sé qué tiene.

translation.en: -[Cameron] Let's do it. -Oh yeah.
No, no, no, no. This is just for Little Miss Mia.
translation.es: No. Esto es solo para la pequeña Mia.

translation.en: It's just enough to get her buzzed.
[Mia] Shit, three shots?
Maybe I can skip something tomorrow.
If you're gonna do something wrong, do it right.
translation.es: Si vas a hacer algo malo, hazlo bien.

translation.en: [Mia] I need to show them I'm better, that I can be normal.
translation.es: Debo mostrarles que estoy mejor y que puedo ser normal.

translation.en: [Will] Okay.
Yeah.
Yes, Mia! Fucking legend. Salud!
What? It's just a buzz.
translation.es: ¿Qué? Es solo un poco de alcohol.

translation.en: [Mia] Just enough to get me buzzed.
…this massive family pickle, and it's just been a bit of a conundrum.
translation.es: …un problema familiar que siempre ha sido un misterio.

translation.en: Oh, sorry. What did you say?
Sorry, I think I have plans.
translation.es: Disculpa, creo que tengo otros planes.

translation.en: Sorry.
What a classy pair we make.
Are you… Are you holding up okay? Yeah?
[Mia] Can I try?
-[coughing] -Okay. That's enough for you.
-[coughing] -Mm.
Who would choose to do that?
I don't think I've seen you this happy in…
translation.es: Creo que no te veía tan feliz desde…

translation.en: I don't even know.
Whose fault is that?
-I thought you didn't want me to visit. -Seven fucking months, Cam.
translation.es: - Pensé que no querías que fuera. - Siete meses, Cam.

translation.en: I know.
Look, I am sorry I didn't visit you, okay?
I know I fucked up. But I…
That's all I'm going to apologize for
because I know you're gonna hate me for it.
translation.es: Aunque me odies, no me arrepiento de haber hablado con tus padres.

translation.en: But I… don't regret telling your parents. I didn't know what else to do.
translation.es: Aunque me odies, no me arrepiento de haber hablado con tus padres. - Ya no sabía… - Tu bragueta.

translation.en: Your fly's undone.
She's gone. She's gone!
translation.es: Ya se fue. - ¡Ya se fue! - Ahí voy. Mierda, estuvo cerca.

translation.en: [girl] Coming. Fucking hell, that was close.
translation.es: - ¡Ya se fue! - Ahí voy. Mierda, estuvo cerca.

translation.en: "Quick shag in the bushes," he said. "Oh, what could go wrong," he said.
translation.es: "Un rapidito en los arbustos, ¿qué podría salir mal?".

translation.en: Are you okay?
It's never gonna be like it was, is it?
translation.es: Nunca volverá a ser como antes, ¿no?

translation.en: Give her some time.
Come on.
[Mia] So, this is what everyone always goes on about.
translation.es: Así que esto es de lo que todo el mundo habla.

translation.en: Drinking is what helps you belong.
translation.es: El alcohol es lo que te ayuda a ser una más.

translation.en: Open up. Join in.
Because here's the thing about getting drunk,
all the shit at the back of your head,
translation.es: toda la mierda que te preocupa

translation.en: twisting in the pit of your stomach,
translation.es: y que te retuerce la boca del estómago

translation.en: it all just trickles down to something else.
-[dance beat thumping] -Something sweeter. It strips you back to basics.
translation.es: Es algo placentero que te despoja de todo lo secundario

translation.en: And leaves you, just you,
translation.es: y te deja a ti sola, en tu esencia,

translation.en: floating through space.
-[dance music playing] -You all right?
[Mia] And dancing.
How could I not have known how good it feels to just… [gasps]
translation.es: ¿Cómo es que no sabía lo bien que se siente el poder…?

translation.en: [Mia] No words.
No words, except…
Who is she?
[Theo] Mia! You came!
Hey. Hi.
Hey and hi.
I've lost the plot. Help me find it before it thickens.
translation.es: Estoy en la estratósfera. Ayúdame a volver a Tierra.

translation.en: How about I help you find some water first?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal si antes te ayudo a buscar agua?

translation.en: [Theo] Here we are.
Two more of these, and you'll be right as rain.
translation.es: Dos más y estarás como nueva.

translation.en: Thank you, sailor.
The party seems to agree with you.
I feel very heavy but very light.
translation.es: Me siento pesada pero muy ligera.

translation.en: I think I finally understand house music.
translation.es: Por fin entiendo la música house.

translation.en: [Mia] He's so lovely.
That's it. That is definitely nose-width.
translation.es: Bien. Estamos a una nariz de distancia.

translation.en: [Mia] Oh God. Oh fuck.
Did I do it wrong? Did I…
Oh shit.
Oh goddamn…
That's the other thing about getting drunk.
-Are you okay? -[Mia] When you fuck up…
I'm sorry.
…you fuck all the way up.
Oh fuck. I'm sorry.
What the fuck?
I'm sorry.
[Theo] Yes.
Yeah. Yes, she's coming around.
Okay, I will.
Don't worry, Mia, the ambulance is nearly here.
translation.es: No te preocupes, Mia, ya viene la ambulancia.

translation.en: [Mia] No. No.
[Mia] This is not happening. This seriously cannot be…
translation.es: No puede ser. No puede estar pasando esto.

translation.en: Fuck.
-Jesus fucking Christ, M. -What happened?
Are you alright?
The embarrassment's terminal, but… apart from that, I'm fine.
translation.es: La vergüenza es terminal, pero fuera de eso, estoy bien.

translation.en: They just gave me a lecture about underage binge-drinking.
translation.es: Me sermonearon sobre el consumo excesivo de alcohol.

translation.en: Apparently, three shots still count.
Please tell me no one rang my parents.
Seriously, you don't know how this goes. They will send me straight back, no questions asked.
translation.es: En serio, sería un escándalo. Me enviarían de regreso, sin preguntar.

translation.en: [Cameron] Okay.
Okay.
We promise.
[Becca] Why did you come out so hot?
"Party, kiss,
translation.es: "Salir de fiesta, besar… LISTA DE PENDIENTES

translation.en: get drunk,
drugs, sex."
It's a shopping list.
Bucket list.
All the things I didn't realize I'd have to catch up on.
translation.es: Es todo lo que me perdí. Quiero ponerme al día.

translation.en: You were trying to do all this in one night?
translation.es: ¿Intentabas hacer todo esto en una noche?

translation.en: I just wanted to show you that I was okay.
That I could keep up.
That you didn't have to hide from me.
translation.es: Que no tenían que ocultarme nada.

translation.en: It's fucking stupid.
I'm fucking stupid.
No. No, it's not.
You're not.
Mia, this… this is great.
Yeah, you can do all of this stuff.
translation.es: Sí, puedes hacer todas esas cosas.

translation.en: -I'll help you. -We'll all help.
I'm not like you, I'm…
I'm broken.
-[Will] Stop that. -Yeah.
You're not broken. You just didn't have us.
translation.es: Tu único problema es que no estábamos contigo.

translation.en: Yeah, we're here to help you do all the stupid stuff.
translation.es: Sí, te ayudaremos a hacer todas esas estupideces.

translation.en: To help you say "fuck it."
Right.
"The Fuck It Bucket."
What do you think?
I just really fucking missed you guys.
All right. Come on, wild man.
Let's get you home.
Rest you up for all the sex you'll be having, eh?
translation.es: Debes descansar para todo el sexo que tendrás.

translation.en: [Mia] Safe to say, I lost that round.
Hospital two, Mia nil.
But this time, I'm not alone.
translation.es: Pero, esta vez, no estoy sola.

translation.en: So let's try this fucker again.
Are you gonna puke on me?
Yeah.
Okay.
-[vomits] -Okay…
